page.title: 17LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: {LOCAL FIRMS: On the road from ASCOT east towards Virginia Water are a number of shops and small firms. There is a Wine merchants, a corner shop selling food, a Carhire firm, a hairdressers, a Clothes shop, a Computer firm, a Shop selling electrical goods, a Post Office two Printing firms, a Builders, a Pub, a Restaurant and a Plant Nursury. {HOWELL LTD: The firm are builders and they have 40 assistants. Their opening and closing times are 8.00 in the morning till 5.00 p.m. Their family helps in the work. They're not completely a family business.They have had the business 25 years. They are a small business. They are not part of a much bigger firm.
